original_text: He had been hired to intimidate me so that I would commit a sin by doing this, and then they would give me a bad name to discredit me.
korean_text: 그들이 뇌물을 준 까닭은 나를 두렵게 하고 이렇게 함으로 범죄하게 하고 악한 말을 지어 나를 비방하려 함이었느니라

sentences.original_text: He had been hired to intimidate me
so that I would commit a sin by doing this
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 이것을 행하여 죄를 범하게 되리라

sentences.original_text: and then they would give me a bad name
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 내게 나쁜 이름을 붙일 것이라
